meanings.definition: The quality of being determined and resourceful in achieving one's goals.
meanings.sent1: Her scrappiness helped her overcome many obstacles in life.
meanings.sent2: I admire the scrappiness of the little squirrel trying to reach the acorns.
meanings.sent3: The scrappiness of the determined ant trying to carry a large crumb was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His scrappiness in the face of adversity was like a beacon of hope in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The scrappiness of the young entrepreneur was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A state of being feisty or aggressive in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The scrappiness of the small dog made it stand out in the park.
meanings.sent2: She showed her scrappiness by standing up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's scrappiness in chasing its tail was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His scrappiness in the boxing ring was like that of a fierce lion.
meanings.sent5: The scrappiness of the soccer player on the field was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The act of using whatever means necessary to succeed.
meanings.sent1: In business, sometimes a little scrappiness is needed to get ahead.
meanings.sent2: The detective's scrappiness in solving the case was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The scrappiness of the chef in creating a new dish was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her scrappiness in finding a solution to the problem was like a light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The scrappiness of the team in the competition was truly remarkable.
